title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 32.4 - Time of publication and circulation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 32.4 - Time of publication and circulation

State Regulations

The publication of notice pursuant to section
32.2
or
32.3
(a), as
applicable, of this Part shall be done in accordance with the time requirements
set forth in section
99-s
of
the General Municipal Law. The circulation of notice pursuant to section
32.3
(b) of this

Part, shall be deemed to have been made if such notice is delivered within the
period of time set forth in section
99-s
of
the General Municipal Law for the publication of notice. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
32.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
